text:
[Verse]
Stars above the night is bright
Feel the rhythm feel the light
Let's get lost right here tonight
Soar above the city sights

[Verse 2]
Feet are moving hearts so free
Underneath this ancient tree
Feel the magic you and me
Dancing wild in harmony

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Everything is alright
Shining like the starlight
Together we take flight

[Verse 3]
Whisper secrets in my ear
All the world just disappears
No more doubts and no more fears
Just the music we hold dear

[Chorus]
Dancing in the moonlight
Everything is alright
Shining like the starlight
Together we take flight

[Bridge]
Feel the bass beneath our feet
Pulse of magic through the streets
Love the music love the beat
Feel the world so sweet so sweet
title: Dancing in the Moonlight
